sentences.english: Environmental protection departments under the State Council shall be held responsible for the interpretation of This Bylaw .
sentences.chinese: 本细则由国务院环境保护部门负责解释。

sentences.english: Article 32. Environmental protection departments under the State Council shall be held responsible for the interpretation of This Bylaw .
sentences.chinese: 第三十二条本细则由国务院环境保护部门负责解释。

sentences.english: There are 265 national-level nature conservation zones, according to the Ministry of Environmental Protection.
sentences.chinese: 据环境保护部，中国有265个国家级自然保护区。

sentences.english: The local standards for the discharge of water pollutants must be reported to the environmental protection department of the State Council for the record.
sentences.chinese: 地方水污染物排放标准须报国务院环境保护部门备案。

sentences.english: 1970 - The United States Environmental Protection Agency begins operations.
sentences.chinese: 1970年美国环境保护部开始运行。

sentences.english: The Environmental Conservation Department sends road kill to feed the falcons.
sentences.chinese: 环境保护部将公路上撞死或压死的动物送来喂游隼。
